rev.comment: /* Promoting Trump's presidential goals */ convert to past tense, not necessarily endorsing rest of the section
rev.diff:
Line 34: Line 34:
====Promoting Trump's presidential goals====
====Promoting Trump's presidential goals====
â
When husband Donald Trump claimed to have US presidential ambitions, Melania Trump has started to insert herself into that effort and catching the attention of the media. Reports in the media state: "Melania Trump is already pondering her role as a possible First Lady - all while plugging her QVC line of sparkly baubles."<ref>{{cite news|last=Goldwert|first=Lindsay|title=Melania Trump talks First Lady ambitions; Of Michelle Obama, 'She'd look great in my QVC jewelry'|url=http://articles.nydailynews.com/2011-04-25/entertainment/29492131_1_first-lady-michelle-obama-trump-style|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=New York Daily News|date=April 25, 2011}}</ref> "Melania Trump will stand by her husband whether he decides to run for president or not."<ref>{{cite news|title=Melania Trump Talks Obama's Birth Certificate, First Lady Possibility|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/04/21/melania-trump-talks-obama_n_852154.html|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=Huffington Post|date=04/21/11}}</ref> And speculation about: "Would Melania Trump Be the Hottest First Lady Ever?"<ref>{{cite news|title=Would Melania Trump Be the Hottest First Lady Ever?|url=http://www.sodahead.com/entertainment/would-melania-trump-be-the-hottest-first-lady-ever/question-1707527/|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=sodahead.com|date=April 22, 2011}}</ref>
+
When husband Donald Trump announced US presidential ambitions, Melania Trump started to insert herself into that effort and catching the attention of the media. Reports in the media state: "Melania Trump is already pondering her role as a possible First Lady - all while plugging her QVC line of sparkly baubles."<ref>{{cite news|last=Goldwert|first=Lindsay|title=Melania Trump talks First Lady ambitions; Of Michelle Obama, 'She'd look great in my QVC jewelry'|url=http://articles.nydailynews.com/2011-04-25/entertainment/29492131_1_first-lady-michelle-obama-trump-style|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=New York Daily News|date=April 25, 2011}}</ref> "Melania Trump will stand by her husband whether he decides to run for president or not."<ref>{{cite news|title=Melania Trump Talks Obama's Birth Certificate, First Lady Possibility|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/04/21/melania-trump-talks-obama_n_852154.html|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=Huffington Post|date=04/21/11}}</ref> And speculation about: "Would Melania Trump Be the Hottest First Lady Ever?"<ref>{{cite news|title=Would Melania Trump Be the Hottest First Lady Ever?|url=http://www.sodahead.com/entertainment/would-melania-trump-be-the-hottest-first-lady-ever/question-1707527/|accessdate=2 May 2011|newspaper=sodahead.com|date=April 22, 2011}}</ref>
